title: Xerath ult bug
body:
Did anybody have the same bug? I had it 3 times in a normal. Xerath just ulted onto him self the first shot. 

It could be because of some lagspike that some bullshit happened but I wanted to put this out there.

replies.body:
Apparently this is the german section, so why you wrote in english?

There are many Threads about this bug. Hope it gets fixed soon, cause its soooo annoying and i love Xerath.

Dies ist die Deutsche Sektion, warum schreibst du in Englisch?

Es existieren bereits viele Threads die diesen Bug behandeln. Hoffentlich wird er bald gefixt, denn es ist so nervig und ich liebe {{champion:101}}
